articles.title: South Side Assets in Mt. Kumgang to Be Frozen
articles.content:
South Side Assets in Mt. Kumgang to Be Frozen
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the General Guidance Bureau for the Development of Scenic Spots of the DPRK issued the following statement Thursday:
					 The Cabinet and relevant institutions of the DPRK recently conducted an overall survey of real estates of the south side in the Mt. Kumgang Tourist Zone.
					
					 The survey was carried out, pursuant to the solemn declaration made internally and externally in a statement of a spokesman for the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee on March 4 that it would allow the tour of the Kaesong area from March and the tour of Mt. Kumgang from April and take resolute measures in case the south Korean authorities continue obstructing the resumption of the tour.
					
					 The south Korean authorities, however, have not taken any sincere approach toward the resumption of the tour while talking about "adherence to their stand" despite our persevering efforts and the unanimous demand of the south Koreans from all walks of life.
					
					 It is against this backdrop that we started the survey to freeze the real estates of the south side in the tourist zone as already declared.
					
					 By nature, no law stipulates that survey should precede any measure for the freeze of the south side's real estates and no one was entitled to blame us for directly taking the measure for the freeze of those estates in retaliation against the south Korean authorities' undisguised act of blocking the tour.
					
					 We, however, showed such magnanimity as allowing those concerned to witness the survey before taking the action to freeze the estates and sufficiently adjusting the period of survey, taking into consideration the feelings of the south Korean businesses which suffered a lot due to the traitorous group's insolent behavior.
					
					 The puppet group worked hard to scuttle the above-said survey in defiance of the above-mentioned magnanimity.
					
					 The puppet conservative group did not respond to the survey of real estates belonging to the authorities in the zone, blatantly challenging it, and even prevented the relevant businesses of the south side from undergoing the survey. 52 persons concerned belonging to 33 enterprises responded to the survey but only 16 persons belonging to nine enterprises out of them came to Mt. Kumgang within the designated date to undergo the survey.
					
					 The group has also got frantic in escalating the confrontation with the DPRK and smear campaign, groundlessly finding fault with the survey conducted by us under such pretexts as "violation of property right" and "breach of south-north agreement and international norms".
					
					 As for the "violation of property right" touted by the puppet group, it is nothing but sheer sophism which reminds one of a guilty party filing the suit first, not aware to whom Mt. Kumgang belongs.
					
					 Enormous are economic losses suffered by us due to the long suspension of the tour and the confiscation of all real estates and facilities of the south side in the tourist zone would not be enough to compensate for them.
					
					 Moreover, how can one assess in cash the military and security value of area of Mt. Kumgang, the south Koreans' wishes to see world famous scenic spots and the joy shown by the Koreans at the tour symbolic of national reconciliation and reunification?
					
					 If there be anyone who suffered losses, it is none other than the Korean people, the Korean nation and the south side's businesses, not the puppet group.
					
					 A great number of the south side's businesses staking their fates on the tour of Mt. Kumgang demonstrated outside the puppet Ministry of Unification in demand of the resumption of the tour but the puppet group did not even show up. It is disgusting, indeed, for the group to talk about "violation of property right."
					
					 It is also preposterous for the group to talk about "breach of south-north agreement and international norms".
					
					  Who did unilaterally suspend the tour after totally violating the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration which are the most important of the north-south agreements and overturning the agreements between us and Hyundai?
					
					 It is the universally accepted practice and common sense that if any economic agreement or contract remains unimplemented for a certain period, it is bound to be scrapped and compensation should be made for the resultant loss, even according to international practice. 
					
					 The step taken by us this time is, in the final analysis, an exercise of a legitimate right fully in line with international practice and norms. 
					
					 No matter how vociferous the puppet group may be, it has no right to say anything about our step. 
					
					 While closely following the attitude of the south Korean authorities towards the survey, we came to finally confirm the fact that the puppet group has neither guilty conscience nor iota of will to improve the inter-Korean relations but is only hell-bent on confrontation, much less intending to resume the tour. 
					
					 It was brought to daylight that the group's talk about what it called "three conditions" was nothing but a jargon intended to scotch the tour. 
					
					 We have no idea of having argument any longer, dealing with the puppet clique now that the south Korean authorities are set to stand in confrontation with us to the last, blatantly challenging us. 
					
					 Under the present situation where the puppet conservative group is free to let loose reckless remarks defiling our dignity and the confrontation of systems has gone beyond the danger line, the issue of tour admits of no argument. 
					
					 Now that there is no way to save the tour of Mt. Kumgang from a crisis, the General Guidance Bureau for the Development of Scenic Spots of the DPRK is authorized to solemnly declare that it enters the phase of implementing the following steps in the wake of the survey of real estates of the south side in the Mt. Kumgang Tourist Zone as already clarified: 
					
					1. We will freeze as the first phase the Mt. Kumgang Reunion Center and the fire brigade belonging to the south Korean authorities and a cultural center, a hot spring resort and tax exemption office belonging to the Tourist Company of south Korea and expel all their management personnel.
					
					2. We will deprive the Hyundai Securities, the Idun Company and the Phyongan Fibre Industrial Co. Ltd of the south side that dodged the survey of their business rights and disallow the entry of those concerned into Mt. Kumgang.
					
					3. Tour of Mt. Kumgang by people at home and abroad will soon start through new business enterprise now that the agreement and contract on the tour made with Hyundai are no longer valid due to the south Korean authorities.
					
					4. In case the south Korean conservative group continues mocking at the sincere efforts of the DPRK and defiling them and escalate confrontation with the DPRK quite contrary to the spirit of the joint declarations and the desire of the nation, we will reexamine the work in the Kaesong Industrial Zone in an all-round way.
					
					 With neither sophism nor sleight of hand can the south Korean authorities flee from the responsibility for having blocked the tour of Mt. Kumgang and driven the north-south relations to a catastrophe. They will have to pay dearly for the consequences.
					
					 We will never remain a passive onlooker to the puppet conservative group's confrontation with the DPRK and its smear campaign but take resolute countermeasures one after another.

articles.title: Anniversary of Election as Chairman of NDC Meeting Held
articles.content:
Anniversary of Election as Chairman of NDC Meeting Held
Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting to celebrate the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK was held at the April 25 House of Culture on Thursday.
					 Present there were senior party, army and state officials, chairpersons of friendly parties, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, leading officials of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, officers and men of the Korean People's Army, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and the press, labor innovators and working people in the city.
					
					 Vice Marshal of the KPA Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's election as NDC chairman was an event of special mention as it provided a sure guarantee for defending the idea of President Kim Il Sung on building self-reliant defence capability and feats performed by him generation after generation and steadily pushing forward the building of a rich and powerful country and the revolutionary cause of Juche, the reporter said, and went on: 
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism with clear insight into the requirement of the Korean revolution in which the anti-imperialist military front has become the main front, first lifeline on which hinges the destiny of the country, the nation and socialism.
					
					 The establishment of the Songun political mode, whereby the military affairs are prioritized as the most important state affairs and the KPA is put forward as core and main forces in defending the country, revolution and socialism and pushing forward socialist construction as a whole, paved the most scientific and original way for shaping policies under socialism. It also provided the army and people of the DPRK with an all-powerful treasured sword for advancing the revolution and construction in an independent and creative way according to their faith.
					
					The DPRK has resolutely frustrated all forms of aggression and challenges of the imperialists and demonstrated its might as an invincible socialist state which wins victory after victory along the road of Juche, the road of Songun, while taking the lead in carrying out the human cause of independence and the socialist cause. This is a precious fruition of the outstanding Songun politics pursued by
						 Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has raised the position and authority of the NDC and established the state leadership system with the NDC as a backbone, thus firmly consolidating the state social system on the principle of giving priority to military affairs and providing a firm power guarantee for embodying the Songun politics in all fields.
					
					 The historic course covered by the DPRK under the leadership of Kim Jong Il is shining as the sacred annals during which he safeguarded the supreme interests of the state with his invincible Songun revolutionary leadership and put the country's overall power on the highest stage.
					
					 Kim Jong Il represents the dignity of our country, the destiny of the nation and the banner for all victories and glory, the reporter said, underscoring the need to bring about a decisive turn in improving the people's standard of living on the basis of the great victory won in effecting a great surge, build a great and prosperous powerful socialist nation, achieve the country's reunification and bring earlier the ultimate victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche under his Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					
					 Tense and acute confrontation still persists on the Korean Peninsula owing to the U.S. invariable hostile policy toward the DPRK, he said, declaring:
					
					 If the U.S. dares intrude into the inviolable sky, land and seas of the DPRK even 0.001mm, the army and the people of the DPRK will completely blow up the enemy stronghold with resolute and merciless strikes.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Meets Chinese Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Meets Chinese Ambassador
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, director of the International Affairs Department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Wednesday met and had a talk with Liu Hongcai, new Chinese ambassador to the DPRK who paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: SPA Deputies Visit Kumsusan Memorial Palace
articles.content:
SPA Deputies Visit Kumsusan Memorial Palace
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly who will participate in the 2nd Session of the 12th SPA visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on Thursday to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung.
					 They visited the sacred temple of Juche in boundless reverence for the President.
					
					 They made deep bows to Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea and founder-builder of the DPRK.

articles.title: SPA Deputies Lay Wreath befere Bust of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
SPA Deputies Lay Wreath befere Bust of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly who will participate in the Second Session of the 12th SPA laid a wreath and bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Thursday.
					 They paid a silent tribute to the memory of Kim Jong Suk, looking back on her precious life as the peerless heroine and woman commander of Mt. Paektu who performed the undying feats in the history of the Songun revolution by setting a noble example in devotedly defending the leader and provided the rosy future of Korea.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Here
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Here
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Personages and delegations of different countries arrived here by air on Thursday to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
					 They are Kamwiziku Octave, secretary general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, a delegation of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo led by Vice-Chairman Rohekele Andre, a delegation of the Tynda City Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Russian Philosophy Association headed by Gennadi Astakhov, a delegation of the Vladivostok Association for the Study of the Songun Policy of Russia headed by Anatoli Dolgachev and a delegation of the Ukrainian Independence Federation headed by Babych Bogdana.
					
					 Arriving earlier were D. Narantuya, member of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, and Lyne Sinyodyium, member of the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Chinese
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Chinese
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by the family of Zhang Weihua, an anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr of China, Thursday on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the 17th anniversary of his election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Japanese
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Japanese
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received floral baskets from the Kanagawa Prefectural Citizen's Society for Promoting the Normalization of Japan-DPRK Diplomatic Relation and Nada Takashi, representative of Ehime Institute for Contemporary Korean Issue in Japan, Thursday on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of his election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Foreign Diplomats
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Foreign Diplomats
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The basket and letter were handed over to Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun by Swedish Ambassador Mats Foyer, doyen of the diplomatic corps, on Thursday.
					
					 Kim Jong Il also received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the 17th anniversary of his election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 The basket and letter were conveyed to an official concerned by Chinese Military, Air and Naval Attache Sun Yanfeng, doyen of the corps, on the same day.

articles.title: People's Art Festival to Be Held
articles.content:
People's Art Festival to Be Held
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Preparations for the 2nd April Spring People's Art Festival have been made in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to commemorate the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (April 15).
					 The organizing committee of the festival has directed great efforts to facelifting the venues -- theaters, music halls, cultural houses, squares, parks and pleasure grounds.
					
					 Diplomas, cups, medals and posters for the festival have come into being.
					
					Art troupes, art squads, itinerant art squads and people of different social strata in the capital and local areas and overseas Korean artistes have prepared fine works reflecting the greatness and noble traits of President Kim Il Sung and the development of the country under the Songun politics of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The festival will be held from April 11 to 19. It will be participated in by more than 3,000 people from some 60 units, divided into groups of experts, art squads, itinerant art squads and working people.
					
					 The festival is held every other year.

articles.title: Press Conference Held at Cuban Embassy
articles.content:
Press Conference Held at Cuban Embassy
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A press conference was held at the Cuban embassy here Thursday on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Cuba and as regards the issue of forcing the U.S. to lift its blockade against Cuba.
					 Present there were mediapersons in Pyongyang and officials concerned.
					
					 Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK Jose Manuel Galego Montano spoke at the press conference.
					
					He referred to the fact that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries provided by President Kim Il Sung together with Fidel Castro Ruz have grown stronger under the care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					 The U.S. vicious blockade against Cuba that lasted for decades has been censured and rejected by many countries, he said, adding that the struggle for the release of the Cuban patriots unreasonably detained in U.S. prison is now under way worldwide.
					
					 He answered the questions raised by reporters.
					
					 The attendants watched a Cuban documentary film. 
					
					 That day the embassy donated books to the People's Grand Study House.

articles.title: New Shoes Moulds Developed
articles.content:
New Shoes Moulds Developed
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the Control Machine Institute under the State Academy of Sciences of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have established a modern injection-molding control system equipped with hundreds of sensing and driving elements including up-to-date control devices.
					They have also opened a way of making high-tech boots moulds and intensified researches into a production process of various models of footwear. 
					
					 Meanwhile, new shoes and boots moulds suitable for the Koreans' constitutional character and taste have been made to be introduced in the Pyongyang and Pothonggang shoes factories and other light industry factories throughout the country.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Obstruct Tour Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Obstruct Tour Flayed
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet Ministry of Unification issued a "statement" and groundlessly faulted the DPRK, while talking about the "guarantee of property right" to the south side businesses and "violation".  In another development, it persistently insisted on the provision of unreasonable "three conditions" and the like, while asserting that it cannot respond to the proposal for the resumption of tour unless this matter is solved. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a brazen-faced action aimed to cover up the crime it committed by deliberately scotching the tour and pass the buck to the north in a bid to calm down the voices of the south Koreans from all walks of life critical of it.
					
					 The commentary cites facts to prove that the south Korean conservative group has made desperate efforts to drive the south Korean businesses coming out for tour to bankruptcy, displeased with them even before its seizure of power.
					
					 The DPRK made a bold decision to allow south Koreans to tour Mt. Kumgang, taking their wishes to see the mountain into full consideration, even though it is situated in a militarily sensitive area, it says, and goes on:
					
					 It also showed such generosity as solving various difficult problems related to the resumption of tour for the national reconciliation and the country's reunification even though the present south Korean authorities pushed the inter-Korean relations to an unpredictable catastrophe.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' approach to the issue, however, stands out in sharp contrast to the sincere attitude taken by the DPRK out of patriotism.
					
					 As for the working contact for the resumption of tour, the south side behaved so impudently as to persistently cling to the issue of "three conditions" there even though the DPRK already gave a satisfactory answer and full guarantee to it, and went the lengths of walking out of the meeting without fixing the date of the next contact.
					
					 The DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the moves of the south Korean conservative group to make the issue of the tour of Mt. Kumgang and the Kaesong area, a symbol of reconciliation and cooperation between the north and the south, serve the purpose of realizing its ambition for inter-Korean confrontation but take resolute follow-up measures.
					
					 Whether the tour is resumed or blocked forever entirely depends on the attitude of the south Korean authorities.

articles.title: Songun Politics Praised
articles.content:
Songun Politics Praised
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The past decade of the June 15 era of reunification hardened the Korean people's faith that they can certainly build a reunified power, dignified and prosperous, on this land of three thousand-ri if they follow and uphold the great Songun idea and leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il with one and the same thought.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday stresses this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is only the great Songun politics which provides a sure guarantee for the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the country's independent and peaceful reunification. This is the faith and will which the Korean people have enshrined in the course of covering the path of glorious struggle and victory under the Songun leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The Songun politics is not only a source of high national dignity and pride and honor of all fellow countrymen but a great banner of reunification and patriotism ushering in the independent reunification and peace and prosperity.   
					
					 The Songun politics of our Party fully represents transparent independent faith, strong pluck and extraordinary political caliber of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 It is the Songun idea, the Songun politics of our Party which implants in all the Koreans the view that the Korean nation is not inferior to other nation and the transparent faith, pluck and independent principle that they can surely frustrate foreign forces' moves for domination, interference and obstruction and achieve national reunification if they go as one in firm unity.
					
					 The historic victory won by the Korean people in the drive for defending socialism strikingly demonstrated the might of the Party's Songun politics which has decisively smashed the imperialists' anti-DPRK moves, fully demonstrating the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation. 
					
					 Steadfast is the will of the Party and people of the DPRK to protect the nation's sovereignty and dignity and push forward the June 15 era of reunification under the uplifted banner of Songun. 
					
					 No force on earth can stem the Korean nation from advancing toward the country's reunification under the banner of Songun while meeting vicious challenges of anti-reunification forces, the article concludes.

articles.title: US and S. Korea Announce War Exercises
articles.content:
US and S. Korea Announce War Exercises
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist warmongers announced that they would stage large-scale firepower exercises together with the south Korean puppet army in the U.S. forces training ground in Phochon, Kyonggi Province, in mid April, according to Yonhap News of south Korea on April 6.
					 The war exercises to be staged under the pretext of "examination of coordination capacity" will reportedly involve the U.S. Second Division in south Korea and the 26th Division and a flying corps of the puppet army as well as motorized units and artillery, engineering and other units of all branches of arms and firepower equipment.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers have recently escalated military provocations against the DPRK, gravely threatening the peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Solution to Registration Fee Issue Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Solution to Registration Fee Issue Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- The Federation of University Students in the 21st Century, the Seoul District Students' Measure Committee for Education, the March of Students and other university students organizations in south Korea held a rally in Seoul on April 3, demanding a solution to the issue of registration fee.
					 At the rally the organizations charged that the authorities have squandered a fabulous amount of money on the "readjustment of four large rivers" and pursued the policy of tax reduction for the rich while persistently turning aside the "commitment to reducing the registration fee by half" they had repeatedly made before their seizure of power.
					
					 Urging the "government" and the "Grand National Party" to make a decision to reduce the registration fee as early as possible, the organizations warned that they would face a stern judgment in the forthcoming "elections to local self-governing bodies" if they ignore this demand of the students to the last.
					
					 The participants in the rally conducted a signature campaign demanding that the authorities immediately opt for settling the issue of registration fee.

articles.title: Support to Korean Schools in Japan Called for
articles.content:
Support to Korean Schools in Japan Called for
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- An emergency rally of mothers in Osaka calling for support to the Korean schools was held in Osaka of Japan on March 30 under the co-sponsorship of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan and the Liaison Council of Mothers in Osaka Prefecture.
					 Ko Ryon Ok, chairperson of the headquarters, made an address at the rally, which was followed by a report of Ryu Yong Hye, chairperson of the council.
					
					 They recalled that members of the societies of mothers for Korean schools, parents of students in different parts of Japan, officials of the women's union and other Korean women have conducted such campaigns as press conference, street information activities and rally for consecutive days to denounce the Japanese government for its scheme to exclude Korean schools from the tuition waiver program for senior high schools.
					
					 The enforcement of the policy of supporting Korean schools depends on how the Korean residents in Japan are struggling, they said, calling upon all mothers to dynamically turn out in the sacred movement for the future of the children of compatriots and defending and development of the national education.
					
					 Then speeches were made by representatives of parents of students of Korean schools and representatives of Japan's civic organizations and organizations for supporting Korean schools.
					
					 The speakers condemned the Japanese government's discrimination against Korean schools as not only a violation of the law on the principle of equality but also an encroachment upon the right to national education.
					
					 Read out at the rally was a written request addressed to the prime minister and the minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan on behalf of the said council.

articles.title: CILRECO Presidium Meeting Held in France
articles.content:
CILRECO Presidium Meeting Held in France
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Presidium of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea (CILRECO) was held in France on Mar. 27.
					 Present there were Robert Charvin, secretary general of the International Association of Lawyers to Support the June 15 Joint Declaration, Willy Burgeon, honorary president of the Wallon Regional Council of Belgium, and Andre Aubry, delegate president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, who are honorary chairmen of the CILRECO, Guy Dupre, secretary general of the CILRECO, and representatives of political parties, social organizations and organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people in France, Britain, Denmark, Germany, Belgium, Portugal, Algeria and other countries and personages of different circles.
					
					 In his report at the meeting Robert Charvin referred to the solidarity activities vigorously conducted by the International Liaison Committee to condemn the U.S. and its followers' hostile policy towards the DPRK on a worldwide scale and support the Korean people's cause of national reunification over the past years.
					
					Last year the DPRK fully demonstrated its sovereignty and dignity in international arena despite the obstructive moves of the U.S. and its followers, thus giving encouragement and confidence to the world progressives in the struggle against imperialism, the reporter noted, adding: This would have been unthinkable without the Songun politics of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting noted with high appreciation that the prestige and national strength of the DPRK have been remarkably enhanced thanks to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il. And they expressed the resolution to intensify the solidarity activities of supporting the DPRK's just proposals for national reunification and conclusion of a peace treaty and the Korean people's efforts for building of a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 The meeting adopted an action program of the CILRECO for 2010 and its final declaration.
					
					 The action program clarified that the CILRECO would focus its activities on supporting the Korean people's efforts to attain the grandiose objective till 2012 as well as the cause of Korea's independent and peaceful reunification.
					
					 The final declaration urged the U.S. to come out for the conclusion of peace treaty without delay, acknowledging that no other country but the U.S. is responsible for replacement of the Armistice Agreement by peace treaty.
					
					  A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 The letter noted that the participants in the meeting strongly denounced the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises, Key Resolve and Foal Eagle, and hardened their determination to intensify the CILRECO activities for disclosing the anti-national and anti-reunification moves of the south Korean authorities who are escalating the inter-Korean confrontation in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					 They also decided to wage more vigorous activities demanding replacement of AA with peace treaty and removal of the concrete walls built in the area south of the Military Demarcation Line on the occasion of the month for international solidarity with the Korean people, it said.

articles.title: Anniversary of Election as NDC Chairman Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Election as NDC Chairman Marked
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- Meetings of youth and students, agricultural workers, workers and trade union members and women's union members were held between April 6 and 8 to celebrate the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Reporters and speakers at the meetings noted that Kim Jong Il's election as NDC chairman provided a sure guarantee for successfully carrying forward President Kim Il Sung's idea and feats for self-reliant defence building and his original nation-building cause and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They said that Kim Jong Il further strengthened the DPRK into the state of Kim Il Sung and formulated the Songun policy as the main political mode of socialism and has fully applied it to the revolution and construction.
					
					 They recalled that Kim Jong Il trained the servicepersons and people to be persons of ideology and faith and closely rallied them and increased the politico-ideological and military power of the DPRK in every way.
					
					 He also unrolled the grandiose plan for building an economic power and, through his energetic leadership, kindled the flames of a new great revolutionary surge across the country, thus making last year a year of epochal changes in which the ideals of the people come true, they stressed.
					
					 They called upon all the people to regard his idea and feats as their motto of life and struggle and immovable faith and remain true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 8 (KCNA) -- In July Juche 69 (1980) President Kim Il Sung provided field guidance to several industrial establishments. One day he gave officials concerned detailed instructions about the construction of a movilon factory and summoned a consultative meeting of officials in the field of industry in South Hamgyong Province.
					 At the meeting he expressed his satisfaction over the success made in a scientific research into movilon which would be conducive to solving quilt and clothing problems at a time when the people were not being fully supplied with quality quilts.
					
					 He then looked back upon a winter night in the early period of his revolutionary activities when he spent in a coat only without a quilt or sheet and even a pillow in a poor house on the way to Mingyuegou.
					
					 He said that having a bad sleep in the cold that night, he made a firm determination to provide the people with downy quilts after the liberation of the country.
					
					 He continued to say that the movilon factory should be built as soon as possible to product cotton for quilts and various kinds of quality cloth with movilon for the people.

articles.title: DDILF anuncia medida de congelar bienes inmuebles de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
DILF anuncia medida de congelar bienes inmuebles de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ATCC) -- El portavoz de la Direccion de Desarrollo Integral de Lugares Famosos (DDILF) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 8 la siguiente declaracion:
					Hace unos dias, el Consejo de Ministros y los organos correspondientes de la RPDC realizaron la investigacion total sobre los bienes inmuebles del Sur de Corea en la zona turistica del monte Kumgang.
					
					Esta labor partio de la declaracion fechada 4 de marzo del portavoz del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico, en la cual anunciamos solemnemente al interior y al exterior del pais que abririamos a partir de marzo y abril las puertas para el turismo a la zona de Kaesong y al monte Kumgang, respectivamente, y que tomariamos resueltas medidas si las autoridades surcoreanas siguen impidiendolo.
					
					Mientras tanto, pese a los esfuerzos constantes de la RPDC y la demanda unanime de diferentes sectores del Sur de Corea, las autoridades surcoreanas no dieron ningun gesto sincero por la reanudacion del turismo insistiendo en el "mantenimiento de la posicion".
					
					Bajo estas circunstancias, como ya hemos declarado, accedimos a la investigacion para congelar los bienes inmuebles de la parte Sur en dicha zona turistica aunque no hay la ley que la exija antes de tomar esa medida. 
					
					Ademas, no habria sido injusto si hubieramos congelado directamente esos inmuebles como medida de sancion a las autoridades surcoreanas que quebraron abiertamente la labor turistica.
					
					Sin embargo, tomando en consideracion la situacion de las empresas surcoreanas que sufren perdidas inocentemente por culpa de la banda de arrogantes traidores, tomamos las medidas indulgentes como llamar a los interesados antes de congelar para que sean testigos de la investigacion y reajustar el periodo de esta labor.
					
					No obstante, la banda de los titeres conservadores surcoreanos actuo siniestramente para frustrar la investigacion de bienes inmuebles despreciando groseramente nuestras medidas comprensivas.
					
					En desafio frontal a la averiguacion de los bienes inmuebles de las autoridades, ellos no la aceptaron e impidieron que las empresas vinculadas fueran investigadas.
					
					Como resultado, de entre 52 personas interesadas de 33 empresas, que dieron su aprobacion a la investigacion, solo 16 de 9 empresas pudieron tomar parte en ella al llegar a tiempo al monte Kumgang.
					
					Bajo el pretexto de la supuesta "violacion del derecho sobre las propiedades" y "de los acuerdos S-N y las normas internacionales", los titeres surcoreanos endurecieron la confrontacion y la campana intrigante contra la RPDC cuestionando absurdamente la averiguacion por parte de ella.
					
					A decir de la "violacion del derecho sobre las propiedades", este sofisma parte de la logica del bandido que no sabe de quien es el monte Kumgang.
					
					Por el cese a largo plazo del turismo, sufrimos enormes perdidas economicas que no seran remuneradas aunque confisquemos todos los bienes inmuebles e instalaciones de la parte Sur en la zona turistica.
					
					Ademas, ?como es posible calcular con el dinero lo que significa la zona del monte Kumgang para la seguridad militar, el deseo de los habitantes surcoreanos de ver los lugares famosos de talla mundial y la alegria de todos los coreanos por el turismo que ha sido el simbolo de reconciliacion nacional y reunificacion?
					
					Los perjudicados no son los titeres surcoreanos sino nuestro pueblo, nuestra nacion y las empresas surcoreanas.
					
					Resulta repugnante el hecho de que quienes hablan de la supuesta "violacion del derecho sobre las propiedades" son los titeres surcoreanos que se mostraron indiferentes a la manifestacion que en demanda del reinicio del turismo al monte Kumgang, realizaron muchas empresas surcoreanas que se sustentan de ese trabajo.
					
					Es extremadamente absurda la hablilla de ellos de la "violacion de los acuerdos S-N y las normas internacionales".
					
					?Quien ha suspendido unilateralmente el turismo violando totalmente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, que ocupan la parte encumbrada de los acuerdos N-S, y los acuerdos entre nuestra parte y el Grupo Hyundai?
					
					Es una costumbre generalizada a nivel mundial que se da a la quiebra algun acuerdo economico o contrato si no se pone en practica por algun tiempo, y se recompensan las perdidas consiguientes.
					
					En fin de cuentas, nuestras medidas significan el ejercicio de nuestro derecho que conviene totalmente a la costumbre y las normas internacionales.
					
					Por eso, la banda de los titeres surcoreanos no tendria nada que decir de ellas por muy habladora que fuera.
					
					Al observar la actitud de las autoridades surcoreanas sobre la reciente investigacion, confirmamos finalmente que ellas no sienten ninguna culpabilidad por la ruptura del turismo lejos de acceder a su reanudacion ni tienen la voluntad de mejorar las relaciones con la RPDC y persiguen unicamente la confrontacion con esta.
					
					Esta vez, se ha revelado con toda claridad que las llamadas "3 condiciones", de que hablan ellas, no pasan de ser una chismeria para estropear la labor turistica.
					
					Ya que las autoridades surcoreanas tratan de enfrentarse hasta el final con la RPDC asumiendo la postura extremadamente desafiante, no queremos andar en dimes y diretes con ellas.
					
					Bajo la situacion de hoy en que por culpa de la banda de conservadores titeres surcoreanos, proliferan las palabras que insultan nuestra dignidad y paso el limite de peligro la confrontacion entre sistemas sociales, quedo eliminado el motivo de debatir el problema de turismo.
					
					Dado que no hay la manera de sacar de la crisis el turismo al monte Kumgang, como ya fue anunciado, la DDILF de la RPDC declara solemnemente bajo la autorizacion que tomaria las siguientes medidas de accion posteriores a la investigacion de los bienes de la parte Sur en la zona turistica del monte Kumgang.
					
					1. Como primer paso, congelamos el centro de entrevista del monte Kumgang, la estacion de bomberos -propiedades de las autoridades surcoreanas que desafiaron frontalmente a la investigacion de bienes inmuebles- y la casa cultural, el sitio de banos termales y la oficina de exencion de impuestos pertenecientes a la "Corporacion del Turismo del Sur de Corea", y deportamos al personal que los cuidaban.
					
					2. Privamos del derecho al trabajo a la "Compania de Valores de Hyundai", la "Compania Idun" y la "Compania Limitada de Industria de Fibra de Phyongan" del Sur de Corea que no han participado en la reciente investigacion de las propiedades inmuebles y desautorizamos a sus empleados el acceso al monte Kumgang.
					
					3. Ya que por culpa de las autoridades surcoreanas, quedaron invalidados los acuerdos y el contrato sobre el turismo concertados entre nuestra parte y el Grupo Hyundai, se reiniciara pronto el turismo de los nacionales y los extranjeros al monte Kumgang a traves del nuevo socio.
					
					4. Si la banda de conservadores surcoreanos burla e insulta los sinceros esfuerzos de la RPDC y recurre de continuo al enfrentamiento con esta en contrasentido al espiritu de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur y a la aspiracion nacional, sera revisada totalmente tambien la labor de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong.
					
					 Aunque recurran a la sofisteria y artimanas de toda indole, las autoridades surcoreanas no podran eludir la responsabilidad de la ruptura del turismo al monte Kumgang y de la situacion catastrofica de las relaciones intercoreanas y tendran que pagarlo muy caro.
					
					No estaremos jamas con brazos cruzados ante las maniobras conflictivas e intrigantes anti-RPDC de la banda de los conservadores titeres surcoreanos, y tomaremos sucesivamente rotundas contramedidas.

articles.title: Regresa a Pyongyang Kim Yong Nam
articles.content:
Regresa a Pyongyang Kim Yong Nam
 Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, regreso el dia 7 a esta capital por avion especial tras terminar su visita oficial y de amistad a la Republica Gabonesa, la Republica de Gambia y la Republica del Senegal.
					Le acompanaron el ministro de Salud Publica Choe Chang Sik, el vicecanciller Kim Hyong Jun y otros.
					
					En el aeropuerto los acogieron el vicepresidente del Presidium de la APS Yang Hyong Sop, el vicecanciller Kung Sok Ung, el viceministro de Salud Publica Ri Pong Hun y el embajador chino en Corea, Liu Hongcai.

articles.title: Acto central por celebrar eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Presidente de CDN
articles.content:
Acto central por celebrar eleccion de Kim Jong Il como Presidente de CDN
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 17o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					Participaron alli los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los presidentes de partidos amigos, los diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las entidades sociales, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los funcionarios de las instituciones de la ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, innovadores laborales y trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC, Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.
					
					La eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del CDN de la RPDC devino un evento especial que preparo la garantia decisiva para defender generacion tras generacion la idea y las proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung en materia de la construccion de la autodefensa nacional y acelerar vigorosamente la construccion de la patria prospera y la causa revolucionaria del Juche, dijo el informante y continuo:
					
					El Dirigente formulo la politica de Songun como el principal modo politico del socialismo, reflejando la demanda de la revolucion coreana en que el frente militar antiimperialista se considera como el frente principal y primera linea de vida que decide el destino del pais, la nacion y el socialismo.
					
					Gracias al establecimiento del modo politico del Songun, que presenta los asuntos militares como el primordial problema estatal, defiende la patria, la revolucion y el socialismo y acelera energicamente la construccion socialista en su conjunto tomando por grueso y fuerza medular al ejercito popular, se allano el mas cientifico y original camino para practicar la politica socialista, y el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea pudieron contar con el remedio omnipotente capaz de llevar adelante la revolucion y la construccion de manera independiente y creadora segun su voluntad. 
					
					Hoy en dia, la RPDC rechaza tajantemente la agresion y los desafios de toda indole de los imperialistas, conduce en la delantera la causa socialista, la de independencia de las masas populares, y sale siempre victoriosa avanzando por la orbita del Juche, la del Songun. De esta manera, exalta su poderio del invencible Estado socialista, lo cual es el precioso fruto de la destacada politica de Songun del Dirigente. 
					
					El Dirigente elevo la posicion y la autoridad del CDN, establecio el sistema de direccion estatal cuyo eje es el CDN y preparo la firme garantia de poder capaz de fortalecer solidamente el sistema estatal y social en el principio de dar prioridad a los asuntos militares y de materializar en todas las esferas la politica de Songun. 
					
					La trayectoria historica de la RPDC conducida por el Dirigente brilla como anales sagrados en que este defendio con su invencible orientacion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun los intereses supremos del Estado y llevo a la maxima fase el poderio estatal en su conjunto. 
					
					El Dirigente es el simbolo de la dignidad de la patria, el destino de la nacion y la bandera de todas las victorias y glorias. 
					
					Debemos alcanzar el cambio decisivo en la mejora de la vida del pueblo, levantar la gran potencia prospera socialista y adelantar el triunfo final de la causa de reunificacion de la patria y la revolucion jucheana bajo la guia del Dirigente sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun y a base de las grandes victorias de gran auge.
					
					En la Peninsula Coreana perdura el estado conflictivo tan tenso y agudo debido a la invariable politica hostil a Corea de EE.UU. 
					
					Si este imperio se atreve a invadir una pulgada del cielo, la tierra y el mar de la RPDC, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea castigaran despiadadamente a los enemigos y aniquilaran por completo su baluarte.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il se reune con nuevo embajador chino
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il se reune con nuevo embajador chino
 Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ATCC) -- El jefe del Departamento Internacional del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Yong Il, departio el dia 7 con el nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular China en Corea, Liu Hongcai, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica a autoridades surcoreanas en el tema de turismo
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica a autoridades surcoreanas en el tema de turismo
Pyongyang, 8 de abril (ATCC) -- En su "declaracion" publicada hace poco, el titere "Ministerio de Reunificacion" del Sur de Corea acuso absurdamente a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hablando del "aseguramiento del derecho sobre propiedades" de las empresas surcoreanas y de la supuesta "violacion". Por otra parte, rehusa obstinadamente el reinicio del turismo al monte Kumgang y a la zona de Kaesong insistiendo en que no puede aceptarlo sin que sean escuchadas sus injustas "3 condiciones".
					Esta locura de las autoridades surcoreanas esta orientada a apaciguar las criticas de diferentes sectores del Sur de Corea al encubrir su crimen de estropear intencionalmente el turismo e imputar la responsabilidad a la RPDC.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este jueves y continua:
					
					Muchos datos revelan que ya desde antes de su llegada al poder, la banda de los conservadores surcoreanos trato de una manera u otra para llevar a la bancarrota a las empresas surcoreanas participantes en el turismo.
					
					Tomando en consideracion el deseo de los surcoreanos de disfrutar el panorama del monte Kumgang, la RPDC dejo abierta la ruta turistica aunque esta zona es muy delicada en sentido militar.
					
					Ademas, aun cuando las actuales autoridades surcoreanas llevaron las relaciones intercoreanas a la fase irremediablemente catastrofica, resolvio con magnanimidad los problemas complicados relacionados con la reanudacion del turismo por la reconciliacion y la reunificacion de la nacion.
					
					En contraste con tal posicion sincera y patriotica de la RPDC, durante el contacto de trabajo sobre el reinicio del turismo, la parte surcoreana insistio de continuo en las "3 condiciones", sobre las cuales aquella ha dado su respuesta suficiente y maxima garantia.
					
					Para colmo, al cabo de actuar muy groseramente, se retiro del contacto sin fijar la fecha del proximo contacto siquiera.
					
					La RPDC tomara resueltas contramedidas sin perdonar nunca las pretensiones de la banda de conservadores surcoreanos de usar el problema de turismo al monte Kumgang y a la zona de Kaesong, simbolo de reconciliacion y cooperacion Norte-Sur, para satisfacer su ambicion de enfrentamiento fratricida.
					
					La reanudacion o el fin del turismo depende enteramente de la actitud de las autoridades surcoreanas.
